verse.name: v1
verse.lines: Here I am waiting, Abide in me I pray newline Here I am longing, for you newline Hide me in your Love, bring me to my knees newline May I know Jesus more and more

verse.name: v2
verse.lines: Come live in me, all my life, take over newline Come breathe in me, and I will reise, on Eagle's wings.
